column1: Kata Robata////The dinning room was very nice
column2: staff service was very friendly. However
column3: the food is not up to par. I love their Soma restaurant more (Soma is sister-restaurant). I tried all of item on happy hour menu and was not impressed. All of the food options were pretty basic and there was no wow factor. I also tried the two ramen choices on the menu
column4: and they were also under average
column5: I had better ramen. I would recommend the ox tail ramen over the spicy one.
